text: Ke (wena Muhammad) yilwa eNdleleni ka-Allâh, wena (awuzi kuthabatha xanduva lwamntu) ngaphandle kwesiqu sakho, kananjalo phembelela amakholwa (ukuba nawo aye kulwa kunye nawe), kungenzeka okokuba uAllâh Uza kuwabamba amandla angendawo abangakholwayo. UAllâh Unamandla kakhulu Unamandla nasekohlwayeni
